room_title: Escape room "The Great Art Heist" by Escape Springfield in Springfield (IL)
review: It was great for our family members to do something together. We all had a great time! We would definitely do it again. I really like the idea they change the rooms so if you want to go back your getting something new.

room_title: Escape room "The Great Art Heist" by Escape Springfield in Springfield (IL)
review: Our group was a bunch of 1st timers so we went in a little nervous but We all had an absolute blast!! Looking forward to trying out another escape room in the near future!!

room_title: Escape room "The Great Art Heist" by Escape Springfield in Springfield (IL)
review: Great staff and well-designed rooms make this a fun entertainment option close to home.
